title: Sampler, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: counted satin, double running and cross stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 57 x 14 cm (22 7/16 x 5 1/2 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Unfinished sampler.  Top reads "Nimep..."  Cross borders along bottom in geometric and floral patterns.

tombstone.epitaph:
